name: Oh No, The Hero Glitched to the End!
name_original: Oh No, The Hero Glitched to the End!
description:
The Demon King's army awoke just yesterday, poised to take over the world. Our band of heroes must work together to...oh. Wait, what?

Did the hero just glitch to the end and beat the final boss?

Now what?

Well, a reality check, for starters. The Demon King is dead, but his army (and top lieutenant) linger on, and the invasion returns in full force. The hero is still missing, and now the white mage, the gunslinger and the clumsy knight must work together to defeat the threat, supervised by a mysterious outside force, 'the goddess'.

That's you, by the way. Did we mention that?

This game was created for My First Game Jam Winter 2021!
